title: Hermitcraft 8 Episode 9: The Swaggon Is Under ATTACK!
author: GoodTimesWithScar
description:
Hermitcraft season 8 episode 9! We start out Ep 8 of Hermitcraft S8 by meeting up with the Boatem crew and talking about the plan for the area. We are going to make a Giga base together and a shop! The Giga base will be Mumbo, Grian, Pearl, Impuls, and me. Also, we have some fun with a Trident and create charged Creepers and get a Creeper head to use to scare the other Hermits with hilarious results. We find the Swaggon attack up by the big eyes crew, so we make V3 of the Swaggon shop in the Nether. See you in the next Hermitcraft episode for revenge on the big eyes :D

Hermitcraft Season 8 playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLSCZsQa9VSCdDJmIMkIuK0XazfnI677oV

---------------------------------------------------------
Hermitcraft SMP - season 8 info:

*GeminiTay: https://www.youtube.com/user/GeminiTard
*PearlescentMoon: https://www.youtube.com/c/PearlescentMoon

We are all playing and building on one big Hermit island together with Minecraft proximity voice chat mod. 

Seed: -7381235180058670651

For more information and links to all things Hermitcraft, follow the link to the Hermitcraft website: https://hermitcraft.com/
